metadata.description: ARM Template for deploying Azure Workbook - Sample Dashboard WPNinjas 2025
The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc.
Tags to apply to the workbook resource
The unique guid for this workbook instance
